participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Reflective and somewhat anxious, Jordan often thinks about his past decisions and their consequences.
participant_1.background: i feel old. i am currently in a juvenile detention center. my mom is coming to visit me tomorrow. i will be released in about a month. i'm here for shoplifting.
